reviewText:
I have used this video as a guide and created several Discussion Forums that are making profits through Google AdSense ads. I have also added some of my own products to the sites.

Everything is explained and demonstrated including the settings to use for best results.

You can have an income-generating Forum up and running in a very short time with this video.

I sure wouldn't have been able to put up Forums fast and easy without this DVD -- and who knows, I may not have every made them work trying to do it by myself.

Jerry Minchey
